Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:26:34
Folder: C6X4ROW - zim insurance coverage - bah and kuw
Message Count: 2

--------------------------------------------------
ID: C6X4ROW_00
From: Marco Arletti <Marco.Arletti@me.zimmermann.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Saima Ahmed <Saima.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>
CC: Nancy Liu <nancy.liu@zimmermann.com>; Marine Hutin <Marine.Hutin@me.zimmermann.com>; George Hammouch <Georges.Hamouche@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-07 20:14
Subject: ZIM Insurance coverage - BAH and KUW
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

Many thanks for the call today and for your help.

 

Please let me summarize the call and give my comments.

 

Both insurance coverages are going to expire by the end of September. For both, the number of documents required for a new contract (not a renewal) is substantial, especially the requirements related to the Ultimate beneficiary owner. This might cause a delay in KUW and most probably in BAH, as the incorporation is not finalized yet.

chunks.text:
Both insurance coverages are going to expire by the end of September. For both, the number of documents required for a new contract (not a renewal) is substantial, especially the requirements related to the Ultimate beneficiary owner. This might cause a delay in KUW and most probably in BAH, as the incorporation is not finalized yet.

 

We understand that Chalhoub wants ZIM KUW and ZIM BAH to have the insurance under their names, to avoid some VAT issues. From our side, if this is the request from Chalhoub, we will try to prepare all the docs with your help, However, in case it is not possible to close the request on time, we are kindly relying on the fact that Chalhoub (either C&B and/or H&C) is going to cover us. That means, the renewal will be under Chalhoub umbrella, if we are not able to get coverage under ZIM entities on time.

 

Please let me know if we are all aligned and if my understanding is correct. 

 

Thanks again once more to all of you for your help with these openings!

 

Regards,

Marco 


--------------------------------------------------
ID: C6X4ROW_01
From: Nancy Liu <Nancy.Liu@zimmermann.com>
To: Marco Arletti <Marco.Arletti@me.zimmermann.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>; Saima Ahmed <Saima.Ahmed@chalhoub.com>
CC: Marine Hutin <Marine.Hutin@me.zimmermann.com>; George Hammouch <Georges.Hamouche@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-20 08:31
Subject: RE: ZIM Insurance coverage - BAH and KUW
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

I hope this finds you well.

From: Nancy Liu <Nancy.Liu@zimmermann.com>

--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

I hope this finds you well.

 

Marco had shared the below summary following your call the week before, but as we havenâ€™t received any feedback yet, I wanted to kindly follow up in his absence.

 

Could you please confirm if our understanding is correct and whether we are aligned on the next steps regarding the insurance coverage for ZIM KUW and ZIM BAH?

 

Thank you very much for your support, and I look forward to your update.

 

Kind regards 

 

 

Nancy Liu 
Senior Finance Manager - Asia

P.   M. +61 434 578 651
